title: High Complexity Components: 5+ Files Over 500 Lines
description: Medium technical debt: Multiple high complexity components identified - notificationService.original.ts (1,233 lines), TourPlanningWorkspace.tsx (874 lines), ticketReconciliationService.ts (790 lines) requiring refactoring. Root cause: Monolithic component growth without refactoring discipline. Prevention: Implement component size limits, establish refactoring triggers, and promote component composition patterns.
